title: @QuarkusProdModeTest, @QuarkusDevModeTest and @QuarkusUnitTest not found
body:
### Describe the bug

The annotations `@QuarkusProdModeTest, @QuarkusDevModeTest` and `@QuarkusUnitTest` are not available in Quarkus 2.3, but they're are specified in the documentation at [https://quarkus.io/guides/getting-started-testing#mixing-quarkustest-with-other-type-of-tests](https://quarkus.io/guides/getting-started-testing#mixing-quarkustest-with-other-type-of-tests).

### Expected behavior

The annotations `@QuarkusProdModeTest, @QuarkusDevModeTest` and `@QuarkusUnitTest` are available or the information about these is removed from documentation at [https://quarkus.io/guides/getting-started-testing#mixing-quarkustest-with-other-type-of-tests](https://quarkus.io/guides/getting-started-testing#mixing-quarkustest-with-other-type-of-tests).

### Actual behavior

_No response_

### How to Reproduce?

_No response_

_No response_

_No response_

_No response_
